pr_title: Ensure CamelContextAware beans have CamelContext set when bound to the registry

timeline.message: Ensure CamelContextAware beans have CamelContext set when bound to the registry

Remove NettyHttpComponent producer method from RestOpenapiResource

Fixes #1237

timeline.author: ppalaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -122,6 +127,8 @@ CamelRuntimeTaskBuildItem bindRuntimeBeansToRegistry(
             RecorderContext recorderContext,
             ContainerBeansBuildItem containerBeans,
             CamelRegistryBuildItem registry,
+            // CamelContextBuildItem placeholder ensures this build step runs after the CamelContext is created
